translation: Behold the Adityas, the Vasus, the Rudras, the two Asvins, and the Maruts; behold many wonders never before seen, O Arjuna.
commentary: 11.6 See behold? Adityas the Adityas? Vasun the Vasus? Rudras the Rudras? Ashvins the (two) Asvins? Maruts the Maruts? And also? Bahuni many? Never seen before? See see? Wonders wonders? India O Bharata.Commentary Adityas? Vasus? Rudras and Maruts have already been described in the previous chapter.Not these alone Behold also many other wonders never seen before by you or anyone else in this world.
